pages.body:
# content.json

This file lists all files a [[zite]] contains. It contains a [[signature]] to verify its integrity and make sure that only authorized people can publish updates.

## External links

* [ZeroNet Docs](/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe/site_development/content_json/)
